titles.title: A bill to repeal the provision of law that provides automatic pay adjustments for Members of Congress.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 1/10/2007--Introduced. Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to eliminate automatic pay adjustments for Members of Congress.
